title: Ep. - 225 - KODY BROWN FROM SISTER WIVES
description:
Sister Wives on TLC documents the life of a polygamist family, which includes father Kody Brown, his four wives (Meri, Janelle, Christine, and Robyn), and their 18 children. Kody talks about how the show was developed, raising 18 children, their reason for moving to Arizona this season, and whether any of his children plan on becoming polygamists. 


Chris, an 8th grade history teacher in Los Angeles, reviews this season of Very Cavallari on E! 



Reality Life with Kate Casey
